AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western commoner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had been raised in their family's common room and given no special treatment. Given core teachings in civility and military training, they were left to peruse whatever role they aspired for in society.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western commoner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into that of a typical Western family and not directly assigned a role to fulfill. Instead that choice was left up to [PAWN_nameDef] as [PAWN_pronoun] could fill in their future where desired and by merit

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Military orphan
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had shared the common fate of [PAWN_possessive] brothers and sisters, had lost or been abandoned [PAWN_possessive] parents and ended up forced into military training from a young age.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Enslaved child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was never placed in the military and were instead forced into slavery from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was told they would never ascend into honorable roles than being beaten down by [PAWN_possessive] masters and forced into labor.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Youngling farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived among an intact family that prioritized producing crop for [PAWN_possessive] state. [PAWN_pronoun] was raised to have no aspirations beyond growing food for [PAWN_possessive] brethren.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Swordsman trainee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a trainee, training in swordsmanship for [PAWN_possessive] state. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught and beaten from a young age to rise in skill with the honored blade to pave their way to a career with in the military.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Stateside farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_possessive] family had focused on producing crop for [PAWN_possessive] state after war had prompted a stark demand for such a role. [PAWN_nameDef] luckily had quite the green thumb, which had left [PAWN_pronoun] mark among the respected farmers of [PAWN_possessive] community.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western merchant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] found a knack by the way of trade. After the collapse of the Covenant, their kind found newfound opportunity for expansion and diplomacy with other factions. One of the forefronts was the flow of materials, and [PAWN_nameDef] could find a fair price for everything that could be traded.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Once a shunned practice, the aftermath of The Great Schism opened the door for medical practice to be held in higher standard. [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many to show that is honor is not held by one's blood, but to fight another day on the battlefield.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western weaponsmith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had chosen his path in life as forger of weapons of war. Finding fondness creating armaments that [PAWN_pronoun] could rely on in the battlefield.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western mercenary
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Unsatisfied or outcast, [PAWN_nameDef] had left [PAWN_pronoun] original state and took up freelance work accepting open mercenary contracts. Coming from a militarized culture proved make it quite the easy career for [PAWN_nameDef] as they had built quickly built a reputation for themselves among several rim colonies.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western minor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a typical rank and file warrior of [PAWN_possessive] kind. Minors are the most common class of Western and are also the least experienced out of all of their superiors.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western swordsman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a highly trained warrior who had been taught how to wield an energy sword with great prowess. As a result, [PAWN_pronoun] had grown to prefer the blade over any form of ranged weaponry.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western healer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Allowed into the army after The Great Schism, Western medics seek to repair those who have been injured on the battlefield. While shameful in the past, [PAWN_nameDef] sought to demonstrate that [PAWN_possessive] honor is held in the battle with death itself.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western general
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After proving [PAWN_possessive] prowess and leadership over the years, [PAWN_nameDef] had become a General for [PAWN_possessive] state. [PAWN_pronoun] was tasked with leading hundreds to thousands of [PAWN_possessive] brothers and sisters into enemy territory.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western imperial admiral
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of the Western navy in its entirety and has complete control over all of its forces. [PAWN_pronoun] commanded everything that goes in and out of the navy and typically only one of them were known to exist at a time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western high councilor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of the High Council and a very important political leader of the Western government. [PAWN_pronoun] normally have to serve at least some military time before [PAWN_pronoun] can get this position.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Enslaved Western
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] somehow survived most of [PAWN_possessive] lives under the boots of [PAWN_possessive] masters through sheer determination. Luckly [PAWN_possessive] strength and ferocity lead to [PAWN_possessive] freedom or survival.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Western prisoner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Whether from misfortune or dishonorable actions, [PAWN_nameDef] was taken as a prisoner by the Western and had forced into hard labor for the Western state.
